Package it.polimi.se2019.model.cards

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.Target
  • public class Target
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Target.Builder  

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Area areaDamage
      Select the Area of the damage: SINGLE: all the targets (to maxtargets) get selected TILE: all the targets in the selected tile ROOM: all the target in the selected room get selected
      private ThreeState cardinal
      TRUE: target must be in same xcord or ycord of POV.
      private ThreeState checkBlackList
      If used in DealDamage: TRUE: targets must be in blackListPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in blackListPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant If used in Move: TRUE: targets are the last $maxTargets of blackListPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in blackListPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant In PowerUp, not relevant
      private ThreeState checkTargetList
      If used in DealDamage: TRUE: targets must be in tar getPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in targetPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant If used in Move: TRUE: targets are the last $maxTargets of targetPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in targetPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant In PowerUp: TRUE: target is the Player in player FALSE: target must not be the Player in player OPTIONAL: not relevant
      private ThreeState differentSquare
      TRUE: targets must be in different Tile FALSE: targets must not be in different Tiles OPTIONAL: not relevant
      private int maxDistance
      Maximum distance from POV Ignored if -1
      private int maxTargets
      How many targets can be selected -1:no limit on maximum targets 0:every target that satisfies the condition must be selected n:select up to n targets
      private int minDistance
      Minimum distance from POV
      private int minTargets
      Minimum amount of targets to be selected if possible
      private PointOfView pointOfView
      Point of it.polimi.se2019.view from where the matching targets are selected
      private ThreeState samePlayerRoom
      TRUE: targets must be in the same room of the POV FALSE: targets must not be in the same room of the POV OPTIONAL: not relevant
      private boolean throughWalls
      TRUE: movements can be done through walls FALSE: movements can't be done through walls
      private ThreeState visibility
      TRUE: target must be visible from POV FALSE: target must not be visible from POV OPTIONAL: target can be anywhere

    • Field Detail

      • visibility

        private ThreeState visibility
        TRUE: target must be visible from POV FALSE: target must not be visible from POV OPTIONAL: target can be anywhere

      • minTargets

        private int minTargets
        Minimum amount of targets to be selected if possible

      • maxTargets

        private int maxTargets
        How many targets can be selected -1:no limit on maximum targets 0:every target that satisfies the condition must be selected n:select up to n targets

      • minDistance

        private int minDistance
        Minimum distance from POV

      • maxDistance

        private int maxDistance
        Maximum distance from POV Ignored if -1

      • areaDamage

        private Area areaDamage
        Select the Area of the damage: SINGLE: all the targets (to maxtargets) get selected TILE: all the targets in the selected tile ROOM: all the target in the selected room get selected

      • cardinal

        private ThreeState cardinal
        TRUE: target must be in same xcord or ycord of POV. Direction is saved and other moves/dealdamages in the same effect with cardinal=TRUE should use the same direction of the first move/dealdamage with cardinal active FALSE: target must not be in same xcord or ycord of POV OPTIONAL: not relevant

      • checkTargetList

        private ThreeState checkTargetList
        If used in DealDamage: TRUE: targets must be in tar getPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in targetPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant If used in Move: TRUE: targets are the last $maxTargets of targetPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in targetPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant In PowerUp: TRUE: target is the Player in player FALSE: target must not be the Player in player OPTIONAL: not relevant

      • checkBlackList

        private ThreeState checkBlackList
        If used in DealDamage: TRUE: targets must be in blackListPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in blackListPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant If used in Move: TRUE: targets are the last $maxTargets of blackListPlayers FALSE: targets must not be in blackListPlayers OPTIONAL: not relevant In PowerUp, not relevant

      • differentSquare

        private ThreeState differentSquare
        TRUE: targets must be in different Tile FALSE: targets must not be in different Tiles OPTIONAL: not relevant

      • samePlayerRoom

        private ThreeState samePlayerRoom
        TRUE: targets must be in the same room of the POV FALSE: targets must not be in the same room of the POV OPTIONAL: not relevant

      • throughWalls

        private boolean throughWalls
        TRUE: movements can be done through walls FALSE: movements can't be done through walls

      • pointOfView

        private PointOfView pointOfView
        Point of it.polimi.se2019.view from where the matching targets are selected

      • getFilterTiles

        public java.util.function.Predicate<Tile> getFilterTiles​(Board board,
                                                         Tile tile,
                                                         Direction direction)
        List of predicates to reduce in and and used to filtering the tiles Uses the following
      • visibility
      • maxDistance and minDistance
      • samePlayerRoom
      • throughWalls
Parameters:
board - the board that is being used
tile - the point of view Tile
Returns:
List of predicates to use in stream()

  • getPlayerListFilter

    public java.util.function.Predicate<Player> getPlayerListFilter​(Player player,
                                                                java.util.List<Player> targetList,
                                                                java.util.List<Player> blackList)
    Filter players using TargetList and BlackList
  • If a List is true, the player must in that list
  • If a List if false, the player mustn't be in that list
Parameters:
player -
targetList -
blackList -
Returns:

  • getMoveDominationTarget

    public Target getMoveDominationTarget()
    Clone the current target, changing the distance option. It handles the case of a Move with ObjectToMove.TARGETSOURCE, when the Target is a Spawn Point: the only possible tile for the SpawnPoint is the same tile he is in, so minDistance and maxTargets must be equal to 0.
    Returns:
